item.title: THANK YOU FOR CHOOSING EKC. FOR SUPPORT LIKE FACEBOOK.COM/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG
DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM

EKC 13.3 HAS BEEN PUSHED AND THE UPDATE PROMPT HAS BEEN FIXED - YOU WILL NOTICE THAT SPORTS HAS BEEN WORKED AROUND AND THAT I CHANGED THE SHORTCUTS FOR TV SHOWS TO COVENANT - COVENANT SEEMS TO HAVE A BETTER CYCLE FOR NEW AIRED EPISODES - MAKE SURE TO ALWAYS FRESH INSTALL AND FORCE CLOSE WHEN ITS DONE

PLAYERS KLUB SIGN UP SITE IS ACTIVE AGAIN. COST IS $5 A MONTH AND YOU GET GREAT LIVE TV. SIGN UP AT BIT.LY/PLAYERSIPTV-AFTER YOU MAKE AN ACCOUNT SIMPLY ENTER IN YOUR LOG IN INFO UNDER LIVE TV IN THE PK LOG IN SECTION
IF YOU REQUIRE A VPN, PLEASE VISIT BIT.LY/PRIVACYVPN - EKC PHONE NUMBER WILL BE DISCONTINUED STARTING OCTOBER. CONTACT US VIA OUR FACEBOOK PAGE OR ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG@GMAIL.COM FOR SUPPORT
